testsuite.name: com.nopcommerce.demo.testsuite.ComputerTest
testsuite.system-out: Click on Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (7b73f2f9b522c4e521d9c32a36cd5124)] -> link text: Desktops] Select by nameName: Z to A to name field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (7b73f2f9b522c4e521d9c32a36cd5124)] -> name: products-orderby]

Click on Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> link text: Desktops] Select by nameName: A to Z to name field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> name: products-orderby] Click on Element[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //body/div[6]/div[3]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/button[1]] Verify Text Build your own computer [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Build your own computer')]] select processor 1 to select processor field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> name: product_attribute_1] Select Ram5 select ram field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> name: product_attribute_2] Select HDD Radio Button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_3_7']] Select OS Vista Primium[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_4_9']] Select Software [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_5_12']] Verify Price[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //span[text() = '$1,475.00']] Click on Addcart Button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[@id='add-to-cart-button-1']] Verify message on greenbar[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/p[1]] Click on closebar[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/span[1]] Mouse hoover on shopping cart[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //span[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Click on shopping cart[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Go to cart')]] Verify shopping cart text: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //div[@class='page-title']/h1[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Update quantity Update shopping cart: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[@id='updatecart']] Verify the total price: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //span[@class='product-subtotal'][text()='$2,950.00']] Click on the checkbox to accept terms:[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: termsofservice] Click on checkout button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[@id='checkout']] Verify welcome text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //h1[text()='Welcome, Please Sign In!']] Click on As guest button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[text()= 'Checkout as Guest']] Enter First name Jane to firstname field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_FirstName] Enter Lastname Taylor to lastname field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_LastName] Enter Email jane@example.com to Email field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_Email] Enter Country 233 to country field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_CountryId] Enter StateField 0 to State field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_StateProvinceId] Enter city London to city field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_City] Enter Address 4,Oxford Street to Address field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_Address1] Enter Zipcode W4 2AB to Zipcode field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_ZipPostalCode] Enter PhoneNumber 5665995116994 to Phonenumber field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_PhoneNumber] Click on checkout Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //div[1]/button[4]] Click on radio button for next day air shipping: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: shippingoption_1] Click on continue button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //body/div[6]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/ol[1]/li[3]/div[2]/form[1]/div[2]/button[1]] Click on credit card [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> css selector: #paymentmethod_1] Click on continue button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //ol[1]/li[4]/div[2]/div[1]/button[1]] Enter the cardholder name in name field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: CardholderName] Enter the card number in number field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: CardNumber] Select the expiry month from list [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: ExpireMonth] Select the expiry year from list [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: ExpireYear] Enter card code [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> id: CardCode] Click on continue button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[@class='button-1 payment-info-next-step-button']] Verify credit card payment method[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //span[contains(text(),'Credit Card')]] Verify shipping method[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/ul[1]/li[1]/span[2]] verify total price[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //tbody/tr[4]/td[2]/span[1]/strong[1]] click on confirm[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Confirm')]] Verify Thank you Text [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Thank you')]] Verify success order text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //strong[contains(text(),'Your order has been successfully processed!')]] Click on continue [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Continue')]] Verify welcome Text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (a72c2f0b5f1ac0441ef2a7d6b974aa57)] -> xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Welcome to our store')]]
